definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: It produces sexual satisfaction - at least to some degree.
sentences.chinese: 在某種程度上創造了性滿足。

sentences.english: Education may explain some of their sexual satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 教育界或許能解釋造成她們性滿足的因素。

sentences.english: Women who are sexually satisfied are happier, regardless of age.
sentences.chinese: 不用考慮年齡，那些得到性滿足的女性會更加快樂。

sentences.english: Deriving pleasure from inflicting pain on either another or yourself.
sentences.chinese: 源自被虐待和被控制的快樂或性滿足。

sentences.english: It may keep a romantic partner faithful because they're sexually satisfied.
sentences.chinese: 它能夠讓愛人保持忠誠，因爲他們得到了性滿足。
